intro: Chondrilla pulchra, commonly known as the beautiful chondrilla, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Chondrilla pulchra is often found in open habitats such as scrublands and coastal areas.
